message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000.  Let me know what you think.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $12,000 is too low for me. This product is high-quality and in high demand. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I understand that the product is high-quality and in demand, but $18,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. Can we consider that?
